                           </span>
                        </li>

         <article class="preface" id="R.1.2">
            <header class="preface-titlepage">
               <h2>Dramatis Personae</h2>
            </header>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">DUKE OF MILAN, Father to Silvia. </span>
            </p>
            <table border="0" class="simplelist" summary="Simple list">
               <tr>
                  <td>
                     <span class="member">
                        <span class="personname">VALENTINE</span>
                        <span class="personname">PROTEUS</span>
                     </span>
                  </td>
                  <td>
                     <span class="member">the two Gentlemen.</span>
                  </td>
               </tr>
            </table>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">ANTONIO, Father to Proteus.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">THURIO, a foolish rival to Valentine.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">EGLAMOUR, Agent for Silvia in her escape.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">HOST, where Julia lodges. </span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">OUTLAWS, with Valentine.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">SPEED, a clownish servant to Valentine.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">LAUNCE, the like to Proteus.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">PANTHINO, Servant to Antonio.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">JULIA, beloved of Proteus.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">SILVIA, beloved of Valentine.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">LUCETTA, waiting-woman to Julia.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">Servants, Musicians.</span>
            </p>
            <p>SCENE  Verona; Milan; the frontiers of Mantua.</p>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.3">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 1. ACT I</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.3.2">1. SCENE I.  Verona. An open place.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.3.3">2. SCENE II.  The same. Garden of JULIA's house.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.3.4">3. SCENE III.  The same. ANTONIO's house.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.3.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  Verona. An open place.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter VALENTINE and PROTEUS</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Cease to persuade, my loving Proteus:</div>
                     <div class="line">Home-keeping youth have ever homely wits.</div>
                     <div class="line">Were't not affection chains thy tender days</div>
                     <div class="line">To the sweet glances of thy honour'd love,</div>
                     <div class="line">I rather would entreat thy company</div>
                     <div class="line">To see the wonders of the world abroad,</div>
                     <div class="line">Than, living dully sluggardized at home,</div>
                     <div class="line">Wear out thy youth with shapeless idleness.</div>
                     <div class="line">But since thou lovest, love still and thrive therein,</div>
                     <div class="line">Even as I would when I to love begin.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Wilt thou be gone? Sweet Valentine, adieu!</div>
                     <div class="line">Think on thy Proteus, when thou haply seest</div>
                     <div class="line">Some rare note-worthy object in thy travel:</div>
                     <div class="line">Wish me partaker in thy happiness</div>
                     <div class="line">When thou dost meet good hap; and in thy danger,</div>
                     <div class="line">If ever danger do environ thee,</div>
                     <div class="line">Commend thy grievance to my holy prayers,</div>
                     <div class="line">For I will be thy beadsman, Valentine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">And on a love-book pray for my success?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon some book I love I'll pray for thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">That's on some shallow story of deep love:</div>
                     <div class="line">How young Leander cross'd the Hellespont.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">That's a deep story of a deeper love:</div>
                     <div class="line">For he was more than over shoes in love.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis true; for you are over boots in love,</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet you never swum the Hellespont.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Over the boots? nay, give me not the boots.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">No, I will not, for it boots thee not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">What?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">To be in love, where scorn is bought with groans;</div>
                     <div class="line">Coy looks with heart-sore sighs; one fading moment's mirth</div>
                     <div class="line">With twenty watchful, weary, tedious nights:</div>
                     <div class="line">If haply won, perhaps a hapless gain;</div>
                     <div class="line">If lost, why then a grievous labour won;</div>
                     <div class="line">However, but a folly bought with wit,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or else a wit by folly vanquished.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">So, by your circumstance, you call me fool.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">So, by your circumstance, I fear you'll prove.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis love you cavil at: I am not Love.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Love is your master, for he masters you:</div>
                     <div class="line">And he that is so yoked by a fool,</div>
                     <div class="line">Methinks, should not be chronicled for wise.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet writers say, as in the sweetest bud</div>
                     <div class="line">The eating canker dwells, so eating love</div>
                     <div class="line">Inhabits in the finest wits of all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">And writers say, as the most forward bud</div>
                     <div class="line">Is eaten by the canker ere it blow,</div>
                     <div class="line">Even so by love the young and tender wit</div>
                     <div class="line">Is turn'd to folly, blasting in the bud,</div>
                     <div class="line">Losing his verdure even in the prime</div>
                     <div class="line">And all the fair effects of future hopes.</div>
                     <div class="line">But wherefore waste I time to counsel thee,</div>
                     <div class="line">That art a votary to fond desire?</div>
                     <div class="line">Once more adieu! my father at the road</div>
                     <div class="line">Expects my coming, there to see me shipp'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">And thither will I bring thee, Valentine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Sweet Proteus, no; now let us take our leave.</div>
                     <div class="line">To Milan let me hear from thee by letters</div>
                     <div class="line">Of thy success in love, and what news else</div>
                     <div class="line">Betideth here in absence of thy friend;</div>
                     <div class="line">And likewise will visit thee with mine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">All happiness bechance to thee in Milan!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">As much to you at home! and so, farewell.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">He after honour hunts, I after love:</div>
                     <div class="line">He leaves his friends to dignify them more,</div>
                     <div class="line">I leave myself, my friends and all, for love.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou, Julia, thou hast metamorphosed me,</div>
                     <div class="line">Made me neglect my studies, lose my time,</div>
                     <div class="line">War with good counsel, set the world at nought;</div>
                     <div class="line">Made wit with musing weak, heart sick with thought.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter SPEED</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir Proteus, save you! Saw you my master?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">But now he parted hence, to embark for Milan.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Twenty to one then he is shipp'd already,</div>
                     <div class="line">And I have play'd the sheep in losing him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Indeed, a sheep doth very often stray,</div>
                     <div class="line">An if the shepherd be a while away.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">You conclude that my master is a shepherd, then,</div>
                     <div class="line">and I a sheep?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I do.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Why then, my horns are his horns, whether I wake or sleep.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">A silly answer and fitting well a sheep.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">This proves me still a sheep.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">True; and thy master a shepherd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, that I can deny by a circumstance.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">It shall go hard but I'll prove it by another.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">The shepherd seeks the sheep, and not the sheep the</div>
                     <div class="line">shepherd; but I seek my master, and my master seeks</div>
                     <div class="line">not me: therefore I am no sheep.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">The sheep for fodder follow the shepherd; the</div>
                     <div class="line">shepherd for food follows not the sheep: thou for</div>
                     <div class="line">wages followest thy master; thy master for wages</div>
                     <div class="line">follows not thee: therefore thou art a sheep.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Such another proof will make me cry 'baa.'</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">But, dost thou hear? gavest thou my letter to Julia?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay sir: I, a lost mutton, gave your letter to her,</div>
                     <div class="line">a laced mutton, and she, a laced mutton, gave me, a</div>
                     <div class="line">lost mutton, nothing for my labour.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Here's too small a pasture for such store of muttons.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">If the ground be overcharged, you were best stick her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay: in that you are astray, 'twere best pound you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, sir, less than a pound shall serve me for</div>
                     <div class="line">carrying your letter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">You mistake; I mean the pound,--a pinfold.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">From a pound to a pin? fold it over and over,</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis threefold too little for carrying a letter to</div>
                     <div class="line">your lover.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">But what said she?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>First nodding</span>  Ay.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Nod--Ay--why, that's noddy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">You mistook, sir; I say, she did nod: and you ask</div>
                     <div class="line">me if she did nod; and I say, 'Ay.'</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">And that set together is noddy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Now you have taken the pains to set it together,</div>
                     <div class="line">take it for your pains.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">No, no; you shall have it for bearing the letter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, I perceive I must be fain to bear with you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Why sir, how do you bear with me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, sir, the letter, very orderly; having nothing</div>
                     <div class="line">but the word 'noddy' for my pains.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Beshrew me, but you have a quick wit.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet it cannot overtake your slow purse.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Come come, open the matter in brief: what said she?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Open your purse, that the money and the matter may</div>
                     <div class="line">be both at once delivered.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, sir, here is for your pains. What said she?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Truly, sir, I think you'll hardly win her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, couldst thou perceive so much from her?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, I could perceive nothing at all from her; no,</div>
                     <div class="line">not so much as a ducat for delivering your letter:</div>
                     <div class="line">and being so hard to me that brought your mind, I</div>
                     <div class="line">fear she'll prove as hard to you in telling your</div>
                     <div class="line">mind. Give her no token but stones; for she's as</div>
                     <div class="line">hard as steel.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">What said she? nothing?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">No, not so much as 'Take this for thy pains.' To</div>
                     <div class="line">testify your bounty, I thank you, you have testerned</div>
                     <div class="line">me; in requital whereof, henceforth carry your</div>
                     <div class="line">letters yourself: and so, sir, I'll commend you to my master.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Go, go, be gone, to save your ship from wreck,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which cannot perish having thee aboard,</div>
                     <div class="line">Being destined to a drier death on shore.</div>
                     <p>Exit SPEED</p>
                     <div class="line">I must go send some better messenger:</div>
                     <div class="line">I fear my Julia would not deign my lines,</div>
                     <div class="line">Receiving them from such a worthless post.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.3.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II.  The same. Garden of JULIA's house.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter JULlA and LUCETTA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">But say, Lucetta, now we are alone,</div>
                     <div class="line">Wouldst thou then counsel me to fall in love?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, madam, so you stumble not unheedfully.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Of all the fair resort of gentlemen</div>
                     <div class="line">That every day with parle encounter me,</div>
                     <div class="line">In thy opinion which is worthiest love?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Please you repeat their names, I'll show my mind</div>
                     <div class="line">According to my shallow simple skill.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">What think'st thou of the fair Sir Eglamour?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">As of a knight well-spoken, neat and fine;</div>
                     <div class="line">But, were I you, he never should be mine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">What think'st thou of the rich Mercatio?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Well of his wealth; but of himself, so so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">What think'st thou of the gentle Proteus?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Lord, Lord! to see what folly reigns in us!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">How now! what means this passion at his name?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Pardon, dear madam: 'tis a passing shame</div>
                     <div class="line">That I, unworthy body as I am,</div>
                     <div class="line">Should censure thus on lovely gentlemen.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Why not on Proteus, as of all the rest?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Then thus: of many good I think him best.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Your reason?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">I have no other, but a woman's reason;</div>
                     <div class="line">I think him so because I think him so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">And wouldst thou have me cast my love on him?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, if you thought your love not cast away.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Why he, of all the rest, hath never moved me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet he, of all the rest, I think, best loves ye.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">His little speaking shows his love but small.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Fire that's closest kept burns most of all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">They do not love that do not show their love.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">O, they love least that let men know their love.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">I would I knew his mind.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Peruse this paper, madam.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">'To Julia.' Say, from whom?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">That the contents will show.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Say, say, who gave it thee?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Valentine's page; and sent, I think, from Proteus.</div>
                     <div class="line">He would have given it you; but I, being in the way,</div>
                     <div class="line">Did in your name receive it: pardon the</div>
                     <div class="line">fault I pray.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, by my modesty, a goodly broker!</div>
                     <div class="line">Dare you presume to harbour wanton lines?</div>
                     <div class="line">To whisper and conspire against my youth?</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, trust me, 'tis an office of great worth</div>
                     <div class="line">And you an officer fit for the place.</div>
                     <div class="line">Or else return no more into my sight.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">To plead for love deserves more fee than hate.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Will ye be gone?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">That you may ruminate.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet I would I had o'erlooked the letter:</div>
                     <div class="line">It were a shame to call her back again</div>
                     <div class="line">And pray her to a fault for which I chid her.</div>
                     <div class="line">What a fool is she, that knows I am a maid,</div>
                     <div class="line">And would not force the letter to my view!</div>
                     <div class="line">Since maids, in modesty, say 'no' to that</div>
                     <div class="line">Which they would have the profferer construe 'ay.'</div>
                     <div class="line">Fie, fie, how wayward is this foolish love</div>
                     <div class="line">That, like a testy babe, will scratch the nurse</div>
                     <div class="line">And presently all humbled kiss the rod!</div>
                     <div class="line">How churlishly I chid Lucetta hence,</div>
                     <div class="line">When willingly I would have had her here!</div>
                     <div class="line">How angerly I taught my brow to frown,</div>
                     <div class="line">When inward joy enforced my heart to smile!</div>
                     <div class="line">My penance is to call Lucetta back</div>
                     <div class="line">And ask remission for my folly past.</div>
                     <div class="line">What ho! Lucetta!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter LUCETTA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">What would your ladyship?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Is't near dinner-time?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">I would it were,</div>
                     <div class="line">That you might kill your stomach on your meat</div>
                     <div class="line">And not upon your maid.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">What is't that you took up so gingerly?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Nothing.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Why didst thou stoop, then?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">To take a paper up that I let fall.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">And is that paper nothing?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Nothing concerning me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Then let it lie for those that it concerns.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Madam, it will not lie where it concerns</div>
                     <div class="line">Unless it have a false interpeter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Some love of yours hath writ to you in rhyme.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">That I might sing it, madam, to a tune.</div>
                     <div class="line">Give me a note: your ladyship can set.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">As little by such toys as may be possible.</div>
                     <div class="line">Best sing it to the tune of 'Light o' love.'</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">It is too heavy for so light a tune.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Heavy! belike it hath some burden then?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, and melodious were it, would you sing it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">And why not you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">I cannot reach so high.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Let's see your song. How now, minion!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Keep tune there still, so you will sing it out:</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet methinks I do not like this tune.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">You do not?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">No, madam; it is too sharp.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">You, minion, are too saucy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, now you are too flat</div>
                     <div class="line">And mar the concord with too harsh a descant:</div>
                     <div class="line">There wanteth but a mean to fill your song.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">The mean is drown'd with your unruly bass.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Indeed, I bid the base for Proteus.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">This babble shall not henceforth trouble me.</div>
                     <div class="line">Here is a coil with protestation!</div>
                     <p>Tears the letter</p>
                     <div class="line">Go get you gone, and let the papers lie:</div>
                     <div class="line">You would be fingering them, to anger me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">She makes it strange; but she would be best pleased</div>
                     <div class="line">To be so anger'd with another letter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, would I were so anger'd with the same!</div>
                     <div class="line">O hateful hands, to tear such loving words!</div>
                     <div class="line">Injurious wasps, to feed on such sweet honey</div>
                     <div class="line">And kill the bees that yield it with your stings!</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll kiss each several paper for amends.</div>
                     <div class="line">Look, here is writ 'kind Julia.' Unkind Julia!</div>
                     <div class="line">As in revenge of thy ingratitude,</div>
                     <div class="line">I throw thy name against the bruising stones,</div>
                     <div class="line">Trampling contemptuously on thy disdain.</div>
                     <div class="line">And here is writ 'love-wounded Proteus.'</div>
                     <div class="line">Poor wounded name! my bosom as a bed</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall lodge thee till thy wound be thoroughly heal'd;</div>
                     <div class="line">And thus I search it with a sovereign kiss.</div>
                     <div class="line">But twice or thrice was 'Proteus' written down.</div>
                     <div class="line">Be calm, good wind, blow not a word away</div>
                     <div class="line">Till I have found each letter in the letter,</div>
                     <div class="line">Except mine own name: that some whirlwind bear</div>
                     <div class="line">Unto a ragged fearful-hanging rock</div>
                     <div class="line">And throw it thence into the raging sea!</div>
                     <div class="line">Lo, here in one line is his name twice writ,</div>
                     <div class="line">'Poor forlorn Proteus, passionate Proteus,</div>
                     <div class="line">To the sweet Julia:' that I'll tear away.</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet I will not, sith so prettily</div>
                     <div class="line">He couples it to his complaining names.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thus will I fold them one on another:</div>
                     <div class="line">Now kiss, embrace, contend, do what you will.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter LUCETTA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Madam,</div>
                     <div class="line">Dinner is ready, and your father stays.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, let us go.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">What, shall these papers lie like tell-tales here?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">If you respect them, best to take them up.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, I was taken up for laying them down:</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet here they shall not lie, for catching cold.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">I see you have a month's mind to them.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCETTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, madam, you may say what sights you see;</div>
                     <div class="line">I see things too, although you judge I wink.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, come; will't please you go?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.3.4">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>3. SCENE III.  The same. ANTONIO's house.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ANTONIO and PANTHINO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Tell me, Panthino, what sad talk was that</div>
                     <div class="line">Wherewith my brother held you in the cloister?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANTHINO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twas of his nephew Proteus, your son.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, what of him?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANTHINO</div>
                     <div class="line">He wonder'd that your lordship</div>
                     <div class="line">Would suffer him to spend his youth at home,</div>
                     <div class="line">While other men, of slender reputation,</div>
                     <div class="line">Put forth their sons to seek preferment out:</div>
                     <div class="line">Some to the wars, to try their fortune there;</div>
                     <div class="line">Some to discover islands far away;</div>
                     <div class="line">Some to the studious universities.</div>
                     <div class="line">For any or for all these exercises,</div>
                     <div class="line">He said that Proteus your son was meet,</div>
                     <div class="line">And did request me to importune you</div>
                     <div class="line">To let him spend his time no more at home,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which would be great impeachment to his age,</div>
                     <div class="line">In having known no travel in his youth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor need'st thou much importune me to that</div>
                     <div class="line">Whereon this month I have been hammering.</div>
                     <div class="line">I have consider'd well his loss of time</div>
                     <div class="line">And how he cannot be a perfect man,</div>
                     <div class="line">Not being tried and tutor'd in the world:</div>
                     <div class="line">Experience is by industry achieved</div>
                     <div class="line">And perfected by the swift course of time.</div>
                     <div class="line">Then tell me, whither were I best to send him?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANTHINO</div>
                     <div class="line">I think your lordship is not ignorant</div>
                     <div class="line">How his companion, youthful Valentine,</div>
                     <div class="line">Attends the emperor in his royal court.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I know it well.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANTHINO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twere good, I think, your lordship sent him thither:</div>
                     <div class="line">There shall he practise tilts and tournaments,</div>
                     <div class="line">Hear sweet discourse, converse with noblemen.</div>
                     <div class="line">And be in eye of every exercise</div>
                     <div class="line">Worthy his youth and nobleness of birth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I like thy counsel; well hast thou advised:</div>
                     <div class="line">And that thou mayst perceive how well I like it,</div>
                     <div class="line">The execution of it shall make known.</div>
                     <div class="line">Even with the speediest expedition</div>
                     <div class="line">I will dispatch him to the emperor's court.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANTHINO</div>
                     <div class="line">To-morrow, may it please you, Don Alphonso,</div>
                     <div class="line">With other gentlemen of good esteem,</div>
                     <div class="line">Are journeying to salute the emperor</div>
                     <div class="line">And to commend their service to his will.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Good company; with them shall Proteus go:</div>
                     <div class="line">And, in good time! now will we break with him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter PROTEUS</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Sweet love! sweet lines! sweet life!</div>
                     <div class="line">Here is her hand, the agent of her heart;</div>
                     <div class="line">Here is her oath for love, her honour's pawn.</div>
                     <div class="line">O, that our fathers would applaud our loves,</div>
                     <div class="line">To seal our happiness with their consents!</div>
                     <div class="line">O heavenly Julia!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">How now! what letter are you reading there?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">May't please your lordship, 'tis a word or two</div>
                     <div class="line">Of commendations sent from Valentine,</div>
                     <div class="line">Deliver'd by a friend that came from him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Lend me the letter; let me see what news.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">There is no news, my lord, but that he writes</div>
                     <div class="line">How happily he lives, how well beloved</div>
                     <div class="line">And daily graced by the emperor;</div>
                     <div class="line">Wishing me with him, partner of his fortune.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">And how stand you affected to his wish?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">As one relying on your lordship's will</div>
                     <div class="line">And not depending on his friendly wish.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">My will is something sorted with his wish.</div>
                     <div class="line">Muse not that I thus suddenly proceed;</div>
                     <div class="line">For what I will, I will, and there an end.</div>
                     <div class="line">I am resolved that thou shalt spend some time</div>
                     <div class="line">With Valentinus in the emperor's court:</div>
                     <div class="line">What maintenance he from his friends receives,</div>
                     <div class="line">Like exhibition thou shalt have from me.</div>
                     <div class="line">To-morrow be in readiness to go:</div>
                     <div class="line">Excuse it not, for I am peremptory.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord, I cannot be so soon provided:</div>
                     <div class="line">Please you, deliberate a day or two.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Look, what thou want'st shall be sent after thee:</div>
                     <div class="line">No more of stay! to-morrow thou must go.</div>
                     <div class="line">Come on, Panthino: you shall be employ'd</div>
                     <div class="line">To hasten on his expedition.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt ANTONIO and PANTHINO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Thus have I shunn'd the fire for fear of burning,</div>
                     <div class="line">And drench'd me in the sea, where I am drown'd.</div>
                     <div class="line">I fear'd to show my father Julia's letter,</div>
                     <div class="line">Lest he should take exceptions to my love;</div>
                     <div class="line">And with the vantage of mine own excuse</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath he excepted most against my love.</div>
                     <div class="line">O, how this spring of love resembleth</div>
                     <div class="line">The uncertain glory of an April day,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which now shows all the beauty of the sun,</div>
                     <div class="line">And by and by a cloud takes all away!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter PANTHINO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANTHINO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir Proteus, your father calls for you:</div>
                     <div class="line">He is in haste; therefore, I pray you to go.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, this it is: my heart accords thereto,</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet a thousand times it answers 'no.'</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.4">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 2. ACT II</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.4.2">1. SCENE I.  Milan. The DUKE's palace.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.4.3">2. SCENE II.  Verona. JULIA'S house.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.4.4">3. SCENE III.  The same. A street.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.4.5">4. SCENE IV.  Milan. The DUKE's palace.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.4.6">5. SCENE V.  The same. A street.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.4.7">6. SCENE VI.  The same. The DUKE'S palace.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.4.8">7. SCENE VII.  Verona. JULIA'S house.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.4.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  Milan. The DUKE's palace.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter VALENTINE and SPEED</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, your glove.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Not mine; my gloves are on.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, then, this may be yours, for this is but one.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Ha! let me see: ay, give it me, it's mine:</div>
                     <div class="line">Sweet ornament that decks a thing divine!</div>
                     <div class="line">Ah, Silvia, Silvia!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Madam Silvia! Madam Silvia!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">How now, sirrah?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">She is not within hearing, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, sir, who bade you call her?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Your worship, sir; or else I mistook.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, you'll still be too forward.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet I was last chidden for being too slow.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Go to, sir: tell me, do you know Madam Silvia?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">She that your worship loves?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, how know you that I am in love?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, by these special marks: first, you have</div>
                     <div class="line">learned, like Sir Proteus, to wreathe your arms,</div>
                     <div class="line">like a malecontent; to relish a love-song, like a</div>
                     <div class="line">robin-redbreast; to walk alone, like one that had</div>
                     <div class="line">the pestilence; to sigh, like a school-boy that had</div>
                     <div class="line">lost his A B C; to weep, like a young wench that had</div>
                     <div class="line">buried her grandam; to fast, like one that takes</div>
                     <div class="line">diet; to watch like one that fears robbing; to</div>
                     <div class="line">speak puling, like a beggar at Hallowmas. You were</div>
                     <div class="line">wont, when you laughed, to crow like a cock; when you</div>
                     <div class="line">walked, to walk like one of the lions; when you</div>
                     <div class="line">fasted, it was presently after dinner; when you</div>
                     <div class="line">looked sadly, it was for want of money: and now you</div>
                     <div class="line">are metamorphosed with a mistress, that, when I look</div>
                     <div class="line">on you, I can hardly think you my master.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Are all these things perceived in me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">They are all perceived without ye.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Without me? they cannot.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Without you? nay, that's certain, for, without you</div>
                     <div class="line">were so simple, none else would: but you are so</div>
                     <div class="line">without these follies, that these follies are within</div>
                     <div class="line">you and shine through you like the water in an</div>
                     <div class="line">urinal, that not an eye that sees you but is a</div>
                     <div class="line">physician to comment on your malady.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">But tell me, dost thou know my lady Silvia?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">She that you gaze on so as she sits at supper?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Hast thou observed that? even she, I mean.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, sir, I know her not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Dost thou know her by my gazing on her, and yet</div>
                     <div class="line">knowest her not?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Is she not hard-favoured, sir?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Not so fair, boy, as well-favoured.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, I know that well enough.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">What dost thou know?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">That she is not so fair as, of you, well-favoured.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">I mean that her beauty is exquisite, but her favour infinite.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">That's because the one is painted and the other out</div>
                     <div class="line">of all count.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">How painted? and how out of count?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, sir, so painted, to make her fair, that no</div>
                     <div class="line">man counts of her beauty.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
