                     <div class="line">How esteemest thou me? I account of her beauty.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">You never saw her since she was deformed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">How long hath she been deformed?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Ever since you loved her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">I have loved her ever since I saw her; and still I</div>
                     <div class="line">see her beautiful.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">If you love her, you cannot see her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Why?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Because Love is blind. O, that you had mine eyes;</div>
                     <div class="line">or your own eyes had the lights they were wont to</div>
                     <div class="line">have when you chid at Sir Proteus for going</div>
                     <div class="line">ungartered!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">What should I see then?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Your own present folly and her passing deformity:</div>
                     <div class="line">for he, being in love, could not see to garter his</div>
                     <div class="line">hose, and you, being in love, cannot see to put on your hose.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Belike, boy, then, you are in love; for last</div>
                     <div class="line">morning you could not see to wipe my shoes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">True, sir; I was in love with my bed: I thank you,</div>
                     <div class="line">you swinged me for my love, which makes me the</div>
                     <div class="line">bolder to chide you for yours.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">In conclusion, I stand affected to her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">I would you were set, so your affection would cease.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Last night she enjoined me to write some lines to</div>
                     <div class="line">one she loves.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">And have you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">I have.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Are they not lamely writ?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">No, boy, but as well as I can do them. Peace!</div>
                     <div class="line">here she comes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  O excellent motion! O exceeding puppet!</div>
                     <div class="line">Now will he interpret to her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter SILVIA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Madam and mistress, a thousand good-morrows.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  O, give ye good even! here's a million of manners.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir Valentine and servant, to you two thousand.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  He should give her interest and she gives it him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">As you enjoin'd me, I have writ your letter</div>
                     <div class="line">Unto the secret nameless friend of yours;</div>
                     <div class="line">Which I was much unwilling to proceed in</div>
                     <div class="line">But for my duty to your ladyship.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">I thank you gentle servant: 'tis very clerkly done.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Now trust me, madam, it came hardly off;</div>
                     <div class="line">For being ignorant to whom it goes</div>
                     <div class="line">I writ at random, very doubtfully.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Perchance you think too much of so much pains?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">No, madam; so it stead you, I will write</div>
                     <div class="line">Please you command, a thousand times as much; And yet--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">A pretty period! Well, I guess the sequel;</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet I will not name it; and yet I care not;</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet take this again; and yet I thank you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Meaning henceforth to trouble you no more.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  And yet you will; and yet another 'yet.'</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">What means your ladyship? do you not like it?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Yes, yes; the lines are very quaintly writ;</div>
                     <div class="line">But since unwillingly, take them again.</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, take them.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Madam, they are for you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, ay: you writ them, sir, at my request;</div>
                     <div class="line">But I will none of them; they are for you;</div>
                     <div class="line">I would have had them writ more movingly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Please you, I'll write your ladyship another.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">And when it's writ, for my sake read it over,</div>
                     <div class="line">And if it please you, so; if not, why, so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">If it please me, madam, what then?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, if it please you, take it for your labour:</div>
                     <div class="line">And so, good morrow, servant.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">O jest unseen, inscrutable, invisible,</div>
                     <div class="line">As a nose on a man's face, or a weathercock on a steeple!</div>
                     <div class="line">My master sues to her, and she hath</div>
                     <div class="line">taught her suitor,</div>
                     <div class="line">He being her pupil, to become her tutor.</div>
                     <div class="line">O excellent device! was there ever heard a better,</div>
                     <div class="line">That my master, being scribe, to himself should write</div>
                     <div class="line">the letter?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">How now, sir? what are you reasoning with yourself?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, I was rhyming: 'tis you that have the reason.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">To do what?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">To be a spokesman for Madam Silvia.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">To whom?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">To yourself: why, she wooes you by a figure.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">What figure?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">By a letter, I should say.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, she hath not writ to me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">What need she, when she hath made you write to</div>
                     <div class="line">yourself? Why, do you not perceive the jest?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">No, believe me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">No believing you, indeed, sir. But did you perceive</div>
                     <div class="line">her earnest?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">She gave me none, except an angry word.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, she hath given you a letter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">That's the letter I writ to her friend.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">And that letter hath she delivered, and there an end.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">I would it were no worse.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll warrant you, 'tis as well:</div>
                     <div class="line">For often have you writ to her, and she, in modesty,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or else for want of idle time, could not again reply;</div>
                     <div class="line">Or fearing else some messenger that might her mind discover,</div>
                     <div class="line">Herself hath taught her love himself to write unto her lover.</div>
                     <div class="line">All this I speak in print, for in print I found it.</div>
                     <div class="line">Why muse you, sir? 'tis dinner-time.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">I have dined.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, but hearken, sir; though the chameleon Love can</div>
                     <div class="line">feed on the air, I am one that am nourished by my</div>
                     <div class="line">victuals, and would fain have meat. O, be not like</div>
                     <div class="line">your mistress; be moved, be moved.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.4.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II.  Verona. JULIA'S house.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter PROTEUS and JULIA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Have patience, gentle Julia.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">I must, where is no remedy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">When possibly I can, I will return.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">If you turn not, you will return the sooner.</div>
                     <div class="line">Keep this remembrance for thy Julia's sake.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Giving a ring</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Why then, we'll make exchange; here, take you this.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">And seal the bargain with a holy kiss.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Here is my hand for my true constancy;</div>
                     <div class="line">And when that hour o'erslips me in the day</div>
                     <div class="line">Wherein I sigh not, Julia, for thy sake,</div>
                     <div class="line">The next ensuing hour some foul mischance</div>
                     <div class="line">Torment me for my love's forgetfulness!</div>
                     <div class="line">My father stays my coming; answer not;</div>
                     <div class="line">The tide is now: nay, not thy tide of tears;</div>
                     <div class="line">That tide will stay me longer than I should.</div>
                     <div class="line">Julia, farewell!</div>
                     <p>Exit JULIA</p>
                     <div class="line">What, gone without a word?</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, so true love should do: it cannot speak;</div>
                     <div class="line">For truth hath better deeds than words to grace it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter PANTHINO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANTHINO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir Proteus, you are stay'd for.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Go; I come, I come.</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas! this parting strikes poor lovers dumb.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.4.4">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>3. SCENE III.  The same. A street.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter LAUNCE, leading a dog</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, 'twill be this hour ere I have done weeping;</div>
                     <div class="line">all the kind of the Launces have this very fault. I</div>
                     <div class="line">have received my proportion, like the prodigious</div>
                     <div class="line">son, and am going with Sir Proteus to the Imperial's</div>
                     <div class="line">court. I think Crab, my dog, be the sourest-natured</div>
                     <div class="line">dog that lives: my mother weeping, my father</div>
                     <div class="line">wailing, my sister crying, our maid howling, our cat</div>
                     <div class="line">wringing her hands, and all our house in a great</div>
                     <div class="line">perplexity, yet did not this cruel-hearted cur shed</div>
                     <div class="line">one tear: he is a stone, a very pebble stone, and</div>
                     <div class="line">has no more pity in him than a dog: a Jew would have</div>
                     <div class="line">wept to have seen our parting; why, my grandam,</div>
                     <div class="line">having no eyes, look you, wept herself blind at my</div>
                     <div class="line">parting. Nay, I'll show you the manner of it. This</div>
                     <div class="line">shoe is my father: no, this left shoe is my father:</div>
                     <div class="line">no, no, this left shoe is my mother: nay, that</div>
                     <div class="line">cannot be so neither: yes, it is so, it is so, it</div>
                     <div class="line">hath the worser sole. This shoe, with the hole in</div>
                     <div class="line">it, is my mother, and this my father; a vengeance</div>
                     <div class="line">on't! there 'tis: now, sit, this staff is my</div>
                     <div class="line">sister, for, look you, she is as white as a lily and</div>
                     <div class="line">as small as a wand: this hat is Nan, our maid: I</div>
                     <div class="line">am the dog: no, the dog is himself, and I am the</div>
                     <div class="line">dog--Oh! the dog is me, and I am myself; ay, so,</div>
                     <div class="line">so. Now come I to my father; Father, your blessing:</div>
                     <div class="line">now should not the shoe speak a word for weeping:</div>
                     <div class="line">now should I kiss my father; well, he weeps on. Now</div>
                     <div class="line">come I to my mother: O, that she could speak now</div>
                     <div class="line">like a wood woman! Well, I kiss her; why, there</div>
                     <div class="line">'tis; here's my mother's breath up and down. Now</div>
                     <div class="line">come I to my sister; mark the moan she makes. Now</div>
                     <div class="line">the dog all this while sheds not a tear nor speaks a</div>
                     <div class="line">word; but see how I lay the dust with my tears.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter PANTHINO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANTHINO</div>
                     <div class="line">Launce, away, away, aboard! thy master is shipped</div>
                     <div class="line">and thou art to post after with oars. What's the</div>
                     <div class="line">matter? why weepest thou, man? Away, ass! You'll</div>
                     <div class="line">lose the tide, if you tarry any longer.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">It is no matter if the tied were lost; for it is the</div>
                     <div class="line">unkindest tied that ever any man tied.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANTHINO</div>
                     <div class="line">What's the unkindest tide?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, he that's tied here, Crab, my dog.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANTHINO</div>
                     <div class="line">Tut, man, I mean thou'lt lose the flood, and, in</div>
                     <div class="line">losing the flood, lose thy voyage, and, in losing</div>
                     <div class="line">thy voyage, lose thy master, and, in losing thy</div>
                     <div class="line">master, lose thy service, and, in losing thy</div>
                     <div class="line">service,--Why dost thou stop my mouth?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">For fear thou shouldst lose thy tongue.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANTHINO</div>
                     <div class="line">Where should I lose my tongue?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">In thy tale.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANTHINO</div>
                     <div class="line">In thy tail!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">Lose the tide, and the voyage, and the master, and</div>
                     <div class="line">the service, and the tied! Why, man, if the river</div>
                     <div class="line">were dry, I am able to fill it with my tears; if the</div>
                     <div class="line">wind were down, I could drive the boat with my sighs.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANTHINO</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, come away, man; I was sent to call thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, call me what thou darest.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANTHINO</div>
                     <div class="line">Wilt thou go?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, I will go.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.4.5">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>4. SCENE IV.  Milan. The DUKE's palace.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter SILVIA, VALENTINE, THURIO, and SPEED</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Servant!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Mistress?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Master, Sir Thurio frowns on you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, boy, it's for love.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Not of you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Of my mistress, then.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twere good you knocked him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Servant, you are sad.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Indeed, madam, I seem so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Seem you that you are not?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Haply I do.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">So do counterfeits.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">So do you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What seem I that I am not?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Wise.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What instance of the contrary?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Your folly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">And how quote you my folly?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">I quote it in your jerkin.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">My jerkin is a doublet.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, then, I'll double your folly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">How?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">What, angry, Sir Thurio! do you change colour?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Give him leave, madam; he is a kind of chameleon.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">That hath more mind to feed on your blood than live</div>
                     <div class="line">in your air.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">You have said, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, sir, and done too, for this time.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">I know it well, sir; you always end ere you begin.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">A fine volley of words, gentlemen, and quickly shot off.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis indeed, madam; we thank the giver.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Who is that, servant?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Yourself, sweet lady; for you gave the fire. Sir</div>
                     <div class="line">Thurio borrows his wit from your ladyship's looks,</div>
                     <div class="line">and spends what he borrows kindly in your company.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, if you spend word for word with me, I shall</div>
                     <div class="line">make your wit bankrupt.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">I know it well, sir; you have an exchequer of words,</div>
                     <div class="line">and, I think, no other treasure to give your</div>
                     <div class="line">followers, for it appears by their bare liveries,</div>
                     <div class="line">that they live by your bare words.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">No more, gentlemen, no more:--here comes my father.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter DUKE</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, daughter Silvia, you are hard beset.</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir Valentine, your father's in good health:</div>
                     <div class="line">What say you to a letter from your friends</div>
                     <div class="line">Of much good news?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord, I will be thankful.</div>
                     <div class="line">To any happy messenger from thence.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">Know ye Don Antonio, your countryman?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, my good lord, I know the gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">To be of worth and worthy estimation</div>
                     <div class="line">And not without desert so well reputed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath he not a son?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, my good lord; a son that well deserves</div>
                     <div class="line">The honour and regard of such a father.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">You know him well?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">I know him as myself; for from our infancy</div>
                     <div class="line">We have conversed and spent our hours together:</div>
                     <div class="line">And though myself have been an idle truant,</div>
                     <div class="line">Omitting the sweet benefit of time</div>
                     <div class="line">To clothe mine age with angel-like perfection,</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet hath Sir Proteus, for that's his name,</div>
                     <div class="line">Made use and fair advantage of his days;</div>
                     <div class="line">His years but young, but his experience old;</div>
                     <div class="line">His head unmellow'd, but his judgment ripe;</div>
                     <div class="line">And, in a word, for far behind his worth</div>
                     <div class="line">Comes all the praises that I now bestow,</div>
                     <div class="line">He is complete in feature and in mind</div>
                     <div class="line">With all good grace to grace a gentleman.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">Beshrew me, sir, but if he make this good,</div>
                     <div class="line">He is as worthy for an empress' love</div>
                     <div class="line">As meet to be an emperor's counsellor.</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, sir, this gentleman is come to me,</div>
                     <div class="line">With commendation from great potentates;</div>
                     <div class="line">And here he means to spend his time awhile:</div>
                     <div class="line">I think 'tis no unwelcome news to you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Should I have wish'd a thing, it had been he.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">Welcome him then according to his worth.</div>
                     <div class="line">Silvia, I speak to you, and you, Sir Thurio;</div>
                     <div class="line">For Valentine, I need not cite him to it:</div>
                     <div class="line">I will send him hither to you presently.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">This is the gentleman I told your ladyship</div>
                     <div class="line">Had come along with me, but that his mistress</div>
                     <div class="line">Did hold his eyes lock'd in her crystal looks.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Belike that now she hath enfranchised them</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon some other pawn for fealty.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, sure, I think she holds them prisoners still.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, then he should be blind; and, being blind</div>
                     <div class="line">How could he see his way to seek out you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, lady, Love hath twenty pair of eyes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">They say that Love hath not an eye at all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">To see such lovers, Thurio, as yourself:</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon a homely object Love can wink.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Have done, have done; here comes the gentleman.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit THURIO</p>
               <p>Enter PROTEUS</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Welcome, dear Proteus! Mistress, I beseech you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Confirm his welcome with some special favour.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">His worth is warrant for his welcome hither,</div>
                     <div class="line">If this be he you oft have wish'd to hear from.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Mistress, it is: sweet lady, entertain him</div>
                     <div class="line">To be my fellow-servant to your ladyship.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Too low a mistress for so high a servant.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Not so, sweet lady: but too mean a servant</div>
                     <div class="line">To have a look of such a worthy mistress.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Leave off discourse of disability:</div>
                     <div class="line">Sweet lady, entertain him for your servant.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">My duty will I boast of; nothing else.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">And duty never yet did want his meed:</div>
                     <div class="line">Servant, you are welcome to a worthless mistress.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll die on him that says so but yourself.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">That you are welcome?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">That you are worthless.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter THURIO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Madam, my lord your father would speak with you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">I wait upon his pleasure. Come, Sir Thurio,</div>
                     <div class="line">Go with me. Once more, new servant, welcome:</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll leave you to confer of home affairs;</div>
                     <div class="line">When you have done, we look to hear from you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">We'll both attend upon your ladyship.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt SILVIA and THURIO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, tell me, how do all from whence you came?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Your friends are well and have them much commended.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">And how do yours?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I left them all in health.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">How does your lady? and how thrives your love?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">My tales of love were wont to weary you;</div>
                     <div class="line">I know you joy not in a love discourse.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, Proteus, but that life is alter'd now:</div>
                     <div class="line">I have done penance for contemning Love,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose high imperious thoughts have punish'd me</div>
                     <div class="line">With bitter fasts, with penitential groans,</div>
                     <div class="line">With nightly tears and daily heart-sore sighs;</div>
                     <div class="line">For in revenge of my contempt of love,</div>
                     <div class="line">Love hath chased sleep from my enthralled eyes</div>
                     <div class="line">And made them watchers of mine own heart's sorrow.</div>
                     <div class="line">O gentle Proteus, Love's a mighty lord,</div>
                     <div class="line">And hath so humbled me, as, I confess,</div>
                     <div class="line">There is no woe to his correction,</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor to his service no such joy on earth.</div>
                     <div class="line">Now no discourse, except it be of love;</div>
                     <div class="line">Now can I break my fast, dine, sup and sleep,</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon the very naked name of love.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Enough; I read your fortune in your eye.</div>
                     <div class="line">Was this the idol that you worship so?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Even she; and is she not a heavenly saint?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">No; but she is an earthly paragon.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Call her divine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I will not flatter her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">O, flatter me; for love delights in praises.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">When I was sick, you gave me bitter pills,</div>
                     <div class="line">And I must minister the like to you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Then speak the truth by her; if not divine,</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet let her be a principality,</div>
                     <div class="line">Sovereign to all the creatures on the earth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Except my mistress.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Sweet, except not any;</div>
                     <div class="line">Except thou wilt except against my love.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Have I not reason to prefer mine own?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">And I will help thee to prefer her too:</div>
                     <div class="line">She shall be dignified with this high honour--</div>
                     <div class="line">To bear my lady's train, lest the base earth</div>
                     <div class="line">Should from her vesture chance to steal a kiss</div>
                     <div class="line">And, of so great a favour growing proud,</div>
                     <div class="line">Disdain to root the summer-swelling flower</div>
                     <div class="line">And make rough winter everlastingly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, Valentine, what braggardism is this?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Pardon me, Proteus: all I can is nothing</div>
                     <div class="line">To her whose worth makes other worthies nothing;</div>
                     <div class="line">She is alone.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Then let her alone.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Not for the world: why, man, she is mine own,</div>
                     <div class="line">And I as rich in having such a jewel</div>
                     <div class="line">As twenty seas, if all their sand were pearl,</div>
                     <div class="line">The water nectar and the rocks pure gold.</div>
                     <div class="line">Forgive me that I do not dream on thee,</div>
                     <div class="line">Because thou see'st me dote upon my love.</div>
                     <div class="line">My foolish rival, that her father likes</div>
                     <div class="line">Only for his possessions are so huge,</div>
                     <div class="line">Is gone with her along, and I must after,</div>
                     <div class="line">For love, thou know'st, is full of jealousy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">But she loves you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, and we are betroth'd: nay, more, our,</div>
                     <div class="line">marriage-hour,</div>
                     <div class="line">With all the cunning manner of our flight,</div>
                     <div class="line">Determined of; how I must climb her window,</div>
                     <div class="line">The ladder made of cords, and all the means</div>
                     <div class="line">Plotted and 'greed on for my happiness.</div>
                     <div class="line">Good Proteus, go with me to my chamber,</div>
                     <div class="line">In these affairs to aid me with thy counsel.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Go on before; I shall inquire you forth:</div>
                     <div class="line">I must unto the road, to disembark</div>
                     <div class="line">Some necessaries that I needs must use,</div>
                     <div class="line">And then I'll presently attend you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Will you make haste?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I will.</div>
                     <p>Exit VALENTINE</p>
                     <div class="line">Even as one heat another heat expels,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or as one nail by strength drives out another,</div>
                     <div class="line">So the remembrance of my former love</div>
                     <div class="line">Is by a newer object quite forgotten.</div>
                     <div class="line">Is it mine, or Valentine's praise,</div>
                     <div class="line">Her true perfection, or my false transgression,</div>
                     <div class="line">That makes me reasonless to reason thus?</div>
                     <div class="line">She is fair; and so is Julia that I love--</div>
                     <div class="line">That I did love, for now my love is thaw'd;</div>
                     <div class="line">Which, like a waxen image, 'gainst a fire,</div>
                     <div class="line">Bears no impression of the thing it was.</div>
                     <div class="line">Methinks my zeal to Valentine is cold,</div>
                     <div class="line">And that I love him not as I was wont.</div>
                     <div class="line">O, but I love his lady too too much,</div>
                     <div class="line">And that's the reason I love him so little.</div>
                     <div class="line">How shall I dote on her with more advice,</div>
                     <div class="line">That thus without advice begin to love her!</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis but her picture I have yet beheld,</div>
                     <div class="line">And that hath dazzled my reason's light;</div>
                     <div class="line">But when I look on her perfections,</div>
                     <div class="line">There is no reason but I shall be blind.</div>
                     <div class="line">If I can cheque my erring love, I will;</div>
                     <div class="line">If not, to compass her I'll use my skill.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.4.6">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>5. SCENE V.  The same. A street.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter SPEED and LAUNCE severally</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Launce! by mine honesty, welcome to Milan!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">Forswear not thyself, sweet youth, for I am not</div>
                     <div class="line">welcome. I reckon this always, that a man is never</div>
                     <div class="line">undone till he be hanged, nor never welcome to a</div>
                     <div class="line">place till some certain shot be paid and the hostess</div>
                     <div class="line">say 'Welcome!'</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Come on, you madcap, I'll to the alehouse with you</div>
                     <div class="line">presently; where, for one shot of five pence, thou</div>
                     <div class="line">shalt have five thousand welcomes. But, sirrah, how</div>
                     <div class="line">did thy master part with Madam Julia?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, after they closed in earnest, they parted very</div>
                     <div class="line">fairly in jest.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">But shall she marry him?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">No.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">How then? shall he marry her?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">No, neither.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">What, are they broken?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">No, they are both as whole as a fish.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, then, how stands the matter with them?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, thus: when it stands well with him, it</div>
                     <div class="line">stands well with her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">What an ass art thou! I understand thee not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">What a block art thou, that thou canst not! My</div>
                     <div class="line">staff understands me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">What thou sayest?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, and what I do too: look thee, I'll but lean,</div>
                     <div class="line">and my staff understands me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">It stands under thee, indeed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, stand-under and under-stand is all one.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">But tell me true, will't be a match?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">Ask my dog: if he say ay, it will! if he say no,</div>
                     <div class="line">it will; if he shake his tail and say nothing, it will.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">The conclusion is then that it will.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou shalt never get such a secret from me but by a parable.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis well that I get it so. But, Launce, how sayest</div>
                     <div class="line">thou, that my master is become a notable lover?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">I never knew him otherwise.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Than how?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">A notable lubber, as thou reportest him to be.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, thou whoreson ass, thou mistakest me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, fool, I meant not thee; I meant thy master.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">I tell thee, my master is become a hot lover.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, I tell thee, I care not though he burn himself</div>
                     <div class="line">in love. If thou wilt, go with me to the alehouse;</div>
                     <div class="line">if not, thou art an Hebrew, a Jew, and not worth the</div>
                     <div class="line">name of a Christian.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">Why?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCE</div>
                     <div class="line">Because thou hast not so much charity in thee as to</div>
                     <div class="line">go to the ale with a Christian. Wilt thou go?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                     <div class="line">At thy service.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.4.7">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>6. SCENE VI.  The same. The DUKE'S palace.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter PROTEUS</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">To leave my Julia, shall I be forsworn;</div>
                     <div class="line">To love fair Silvia, shall I be forsworn;</div>
                     <div class="line">To wrong my friend, I shall be much forsworn;</div>
                     <div class="line">And even that power which gave me first my oath</div>
                     <div class="line">Provokes me to this threefold perjury;</div>
                     <div class="line">Love bade me swear and Love bids me forswear.</div>
                     <div class="line">O sweet-suggesting Love, if thou hast sinned,</div>
                     <div class="line">Teach me, thy tempted subject, to excuse it!</div>
                     <div class="line">At first I did adore a twinkling star,</div>
                     <div class="line">But now I worship a celestial sun.</div>
                     <div class="line">Unheedful vows may heedfully be broken,</div>
