                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.2">1. SCENE I.  Milan. An abbey.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.3">2. SCENE II.  The same. The DUKE's palace.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.4">3. SCENE III.  The frontiers of Mantua. The forest.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.5">4. SCENE IV.  Another part of the forest.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  Milan. An abbey.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter EGLAMOUR</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EGLAMOUR</div>
                     <div class="line">The sun begins to gild the western sky;</div>
                     <div class="line">And now it is about the very hour</div>
                     <div class="line">That Silvia, at Friar Patrick's cell, should meet me.</div>
                     <div class="line">She will not fail, for lovers break not hours,</div>
                     <div class="line">Unless it be to come before their time;</div>
                     <div class="line">So much they spur their expedition.</div>
                     <div class="line">See where she comes.</div>
                     <p>Enter SILVIA</p>
                     <div class="line">Lady, a happy evening!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Amen, amen! Go on, good Eglamour,</div>
                     <div class="line">Out at the postern by the abbey-wall:</div>
                     <div class="line">I fear I am attended by some spies.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EGLAMOUR</div>
                     <div class="line">Fear not: the forest is not three leagues off;</div>
                     <div class="line">If we recover that, we are sure enough.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II.  The same. The DUKE's palace.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter THURIO, PROTEUS, and JULIA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir Proteus, what says Silvia to my suit?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">O, sir, I find her milder than she was;</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet she takes exceptions at your person.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What, that my leg is too long?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">No; that it is too little.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll wear a boot, to make it somewhat rounder.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  But love will not be spurr'd to what</div>
                     <div class="line">it loathes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What says she to my face?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">She says it is a fair one.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay then, the wanton lies; my face is black.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">But pearls are fair; and the old saying is,</div>
                     <div class="line">Black men are pearls in beauteous ladies' eyes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  'Tis true; such pearls as put out</div>
                     <div class="line">ladies' eyes;</div>
                     <div class="line">For I had rather wink than look on them.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">How likes she my discourse?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Ill, when you talk of war.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">But well, when I discourse of love and peace?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  But better, indeed, when you hold your peace.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What says she to my valour?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">O, sir, she makes no doubt of that.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  She needs not, when she knows it cowardice.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What says she to my birth?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">That you are well derived.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  True; from a gentleman to a fool.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Considers she my possessions?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">O, ay; and pities them.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Wherefore?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  That such an ass should owe them.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">That they are out by lease.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Here comes the duke.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter DUKE</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">How now, Sir Proteus! how now, Thurio!</div>
                     <div class="line">Which of you saw Sir Eglamour of late?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Not I.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor I.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">Saw you my daughter?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Neither.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">Why then,</div>
                     <div class="line">She's fled unto that peasant Valentine;</div>
                     <div class="line">And Eglamour is in her company.</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis true; for Friar Laurence met them both,</div>
                     <div class="line">As he in penance wander'd through the forest;</div>
                     <div class="line">Him he knew well, and guess'd that it was she,</div>
                     <div class="line">But, being mask'd, he was not sure of it;</div>
                     <div class="line">Besides, she did intend confession</div>
                     <div class="line">At Patrick's cell this even; and there she was not;</div>
                     <div class="line">These likelihoods confirm her flight from hence.</div>
                     <div class="line">Therefore, I pray you, stand not to discourse,</div>
                     <div class="line">But mount you presently and meet with me</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon the rising of the mountain-foot</div>
                     <div class="line">That leads towards Mantua, whither they are fled:</div>
                     <div class="line">Dispatch, sweet gentlemen, and follow me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, this it is to be a peevish girl,</div>
                     <div class="line">That flies her fortune when it follows her.</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll after, more to be revenged on Eglamour</div>
                     <div class="line">Than for the love of reckless Silvia.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">And I will follow, more for Silvia's love</div>
                     <div class="line">Than hate of Eglamour that goes with her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">And I will follow, more to cross that love</div>
                     <div class="line">Than hate for Silvia that is gone for love.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.4">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>3. SCENE III.  The frontiers of Mantua. The forest.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter Outlaws with SILVIA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Outlaw</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, come,</div>
                     <div class="line">Be patient; we must bring you to our captain.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">A thousand more mischances than this one</div>
                     <div class="line">Have learn'd me how to brook this patiently.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Second Outlaw</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, bring her away.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Outlaw</div>
                     <div class="line">Where is the gentleman that was with her?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Third Outlaw</div>
                     <div class="line">Being nimble-footed, he hath outrun us,</div>
                     <div class="line">But Moyses and Valerius follow him.</div>
                     <div class="line">Go thou with her to the west end of the wood;</div>
                     <div class="line">There is our captain: we'll follow him that's fled;</div>
                     <div class="line">The thicket is beset; he cannot 'scape.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Outlaw</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, I must bring you to our captain's cave:</div>
                     <div class="line">Fear not; he bears an honourable mind,</div>
                     <div class="line">And will not use a woman lawlessly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">O Valentine, this I endure for thee!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.5">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>4. SCENE IV.  Another part of the forest.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter VALENTINE</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">How use doth breed a habit in a man!</div>
                     <div class="line">This shadowy desert, unfrequented woods,</div>
                     <div class="line">I better brook than flourishing peopled towns:</div>
                     <div class="line">Here can I sit alone, unseen of any,</div>
                     <div class="line">And to the nightingale's complaining notes</div>
                     <div class="line">Tune my distresses and record my woes.</div>
                     <div class="line">O thou that dost inhabit in my breast,</div>
                     <div class="line">Leave not the mansion so long tenantless,</div>
                     <div class="line">Lest, growing ruinous, the building fall</div>
                     <div class="line">And leave no memory of what it was!</div>
                     <div class="line">Repair me with thy presence, Silvia;</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou gentle nymph, cherish thy forlorn swain!</div>
                     <div class="line">What halloing and what stir is this to-day?</div>
                     <div class="line">These are my mates, that make their wills their law,</div>
                     <div class="line">Have some unhappy passenger in chase.</div>
                     <div class="line">They love me well; yet I have much to do</div>
                     <div class="line">To keep them from uncivil outrages.</div>
                     <div class="line">Withdraw thee, Valentine: who's this comes here?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter PROTEUS, SILVIA, and JULIA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Madam, this service I have done for you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Though you respect not aught your servant doth,</div>
                     <div class="line">To hazard life and rescue you from him</div>
                     <div class="line">That would have forced your honour and your love;</div>
                     <div class="line">Vouchsafe me, for my meed, but one fair look;</div>
                     <div class="line">A smaller boon than this I cannot beg</div>
                     <div class="line">And less than this, I am sure, you cannot give.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  How like a dream is this I see and hear!</div>
                     <div class="line">Love, lend me patience to forbear awhile.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">O miserable, unhappy that I am!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Unhappy were you, madam, ere I came;</div>
                     <div class="line">But by my coming I have made you happy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">By thy approach thou makest me most unhappy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  And me, when he approacheth to your presence.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Had I been seized by a hungry lion,</div>
                     <div class="line">I would have been a breakfast to the beast,</div>
                     <div class="line">Rather than have false Proteus rescue me.</div>
                     <div class="line">O, Heaven be judge how I love Valentine,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose life's as tender to me as my soul!</div>
                     <div class="line">And full as much, for more there cannot be,</div>
                     <div class="line">I do detest false perjured Proteus.</div>
                     <div class="line">Therefore be gone; solicit me no more.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">What dangerous action, stood it next to death,</div>
                     <div class="line">Would I not undergo for one calm look!</div>
                     <div class="line">O, 'tis the curse in love, and still approved,</div>
                     <div class="line">When women cannot love where they're beloved!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">When Proteus cannot love where he's beloved.</div>
                     <div class="line">Read over Julia's heart, thy first best love,</div>
                     <div class="line">For whose dear sake thou didst then rend thy faith</div>
                     <div class="line">Into a thousand oaths; and all those oaths</div>
                     <div class="line">Descended into perjury, to love me.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou hast no faith left now, unless thou'dst two;</div>
                     <div class="line">And that's far worse than none; better have none</div>
                     <div class="line">Than plural faith which is too much by one:</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou counterfeit to thy true friend!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">In love</div>
                     <div class="line">Who respects friend?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">All men but Proteus.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, if the gentle spirit of moving words</div>
                     <div class="line">Can no way change you to a milder form,</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll woo you like a soldier, at arms' end,</div>
                     <div class="line">And love you 'gainst the nature of love,--force ye.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SILVIA</div>
                     <div class="line">O heaven!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll force thee yield to my desire.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Ruffian, let go that rude uncivil touch,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou friend of an ill fashion!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Valentine!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou common friend, that's without faith or love,</div>
                     <div class="line">For such is a friend now; treacherous man!</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou hast beguiled my hopes; nought but mine eye</div>
                     <div class="line">Could have persuaded me: now I dare not say</div>
                     <div class="line">I have one friend alive; thou wouldst disprove me.</div>
                     <div class="line">Who should be trusted, when one's own right hand</div>
                     <div class="line">Is perjured to the bosom? Proteus,</div>
                     <div class="line">I am sorry I must never trust thee more,</div>
                     <div class="line">But count the world a stranger for thy sake.</div>
                     <div class="line">The private wound is deepest: O time most accurst,</div>
                     <div class="line">'Mongst all foes that a friend should be the worst!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">My shame and guilt confounds me.</div>
                     <div class="line">Forgive me, Valentine: if hearty sorrow</div>
                     <div class="line">Be a sufficient ransom for offence,</div>
                     <div class="line">I tender 't here; I do as truly suffer</div>
                     <div class="line">As e'er I did commit.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Then I am paid;</div>
                     <div class="line">And once again I do receive thee honest.</div>
                     <div class="line">Who by repentance is not satisfied</div>
                     <div class="line">Is nor of heaven nor earth, for these are pleased.</div>
                     <div class="line">By penitence the Eternal's wrath's appeased:</div>
                     <div class="line">And, that my love may appear plain and free,</div>
                     <div class="line">All that was mine in Silvia I give thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">O me unhappy!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Swoons</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Look to the boy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, boy! why, wag! how now! what's the matter?</div>
                     <div class="line">Look up; speak.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">O good sir, my master charged me to deliver a ring</div>
                     <div class="line">to Madam Silvia, which, out of my neglect, was never done.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Where is that ring, boy?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Here 'tis; this is it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">How! let me see:</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, this is the ring I gave to Julia.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">O, cry you mercy, sir, I have mistook:</div>
                     <div class="line">This is the ring you sent to Silvia.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">But how camest thou by this ring? At my depart</div>
                     <div class="line">I gave this unto Julia.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">And Julia herself did give it me;</div>
                     <div class="line">And Julia herself hath brought it hither.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">How! Julia!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Behold her that gave aim to all thy oaths,</div>
                     <div class="line">And entertain'd 'em deeply in her heart.</div>
                     <div class="line">How oft hast thou with perjury cleft the root!</div>
                     <div class="line">O Proteus, let this habit make thee blush!</div>
                     <div class="line">Be thou ashamed that I have took upon me</div>
                     <div class="line">Such an immodest raiment, if shame live</div>
                     <div class="line">In a disguise of love:</div>
                     <div class="line">It is the lesser blot, modesty finds,</div>
                     <div class="line">Women to change their shapes than men their minds.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Than men their minds! 'tis true.</div>
                     <div class="line">O heaven! were man</div>
                     <div class="line">But constant, he were perfect. That one error</div>
                     <div class="line">Fills him with faults; makes him run through all the sins:</div>
                     <div class="line">Inconstancy falls off ere it begins.</div>
                     <div class="line">What is in Silvia's face, but I may spy</div>
                     <div class="line">More fresh in Julia's with a constant eye?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, come, a hand from either:</div>
                     <div class="line">Let me be blest to make this happy close;</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twere pity two such friends should be long foes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Bear witness, Heaven, I have my wish for ever.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIA</div>
                     <div class="line">And I mine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter Outlaws, with DUKE and THURIO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Outlaws</div>
                     <div class="line">A prize, a prize, a prize!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Forbear, forbear, I say! it is my lord the duke.</div>
                     <div class="line">Your grace is welcome to a man disgraced,</div>
                     <div class="line">Banished Valentine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir Valentine!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Yonder is Silvia; and Silvia's mine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Thurio, give back, or else embrace thy death;</div>
                     <div class="line">Come not within the measure of my wrath;</div>
                     <div class="line">Do not name Silvia thine; if once again,</div>
                     <div class="line">Verona shall not hold thee. Here she stands;</div>
                     <div class="line">Take but possession of her with a touch:</div>
                     <div class="line">I dare thee but to breathe upon my love.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THURIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir Valentine, I care not for her, I;</div>
                     <div class="line">I hold him but a fool that will endanger</div>
                     <div class="line">His body for a girl that loves him not:</div>
                     <div class="line">I claim her not, and therefore she is thine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">The more degenerate and base art thou,</div>
                     <div class="line">To make such means for her as thou hast done</div>
                     <div class="line">And leave her on such slight conditions.</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, by the honour of my ancestry,</div>
                     <div class="line">I do applaud thy spirit, Valentine,</div>
                     <div class="line">And think thee worthy of an empress' love:</div>
                     <div class="line">Know then, I here forget all former griefs,</div>
                     <div class="line">Cancel all grudge, repeal thee home again,</div>
                     <div class="line">Plead a new state in thy unrivall'd merit,</div>
                     <div class="line">To which I thus subscribe: Sir Valentine,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou art a gentleman and well derived;</div>
                     <div class="line">Take thou thy Silvia, for thou hast deserved her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">I thank your grace; the gift hath made me happy.</div>
                     <div class="line">I now beseech you, for your daughter's sake,</div>
                     <div class="line">To grant one boom that I shall ask of you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">I grant it, for thine own, whate'er it be.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">These banish'd men that I have kept withal</div>
                     <div class="line">Are men endued with worthy qualities:</div>
                     <div class="line">Forgive them what they have committed here</div>
                     <div class="line">And let them be recall'd from their exile:</div>
                     <div class="line">They are reformed, civil, full of good</div>
                     <div class="line">And fit for great employment, worthy lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou hast prevail'd; I pardon them and thee:</div>
                     <div class="line">Dispose of them as thou know'st their deserts.</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, let us go: we will include all jars</div>
                     <div class="line">With triumphs, mirth and rare solemnity.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">And, as we walk along, I dare be bold</div>
                     <div class="line">With our discourse to make your grace to smile.</div>
                     <div class="line">What think you of this page, my lord?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">I think the boy hath grace in him; he blushes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">I warrant you, my lord, more grace than boy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">What mean you by that saying?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Please you, I'll tell you as we pass along,</div>
                     <div class="line">That you will wonder what hath fortuned.</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, Proteus; 'tis your penance but to hear</div>
                     <div class="line">The story of your loves discovered:</div>
                     <div class="line">That done, our day of marriage shall be yours;</div>
                     <div class="line">One feast, one house, one mutual happiness.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
      </article>
      <script src="../../resources/js/prism.js"/>
   </body>
</html>

   <head>
      <link href="../../resources/css/db-prism.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
      <link href="../../resources/css/default.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
      <link href="../../resources/css/prism.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
      <link href="../../resources/css/publishers.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
      <meta charset="utf-8"/>
      <meta content="DocBook XSL 2.0 Stylesheets Vxxx" name="generator"/>
      <script src="../../resources/js/dbmodnizr.js" type="text/javascript"/>
      <title>The Two Gentlemen of Verona</title>
   </head>
   <body>
      <article class="book" id="R.1">
         <header class="book-titlepage">
            <h1>The Two Gentlemen of Verona</h1>
         </header>
         <div class="lists-of-titles">
            <div class="toc">
               <p>
                  <b>Table of Contents</b>
               </p>
               <ul class="toc">
                  <li>
                     <span>
                        <a href="#R.1.2">1. Dramatis Personae</a>
                     </span>
                  </li>
                  <li>
                     <span>
                        <a href="#R.1.3">1. ACT I</a>
                     </span>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.2">1. SCENE I.  Verona. An open place.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.3">2. SCENE II.  The same. Garden of JULIA's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.4">3. SCENE III.  The same. ANTONIO's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </li>
                  <li>
                     <span>
                        <a href="#R.1.4">2. ACT II</a>
                     </span>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.2">1. SCENE I.  Milan. The DUKE's palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.3">2. SCENE II.  Verona. JULIA'S house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.4">3. SCENE III.  The same. A street.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.5">4. SCENE IV.  Milan. The DUKE's palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.6">5. SCENE V.  The same. A street.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.7">6. SCENE VI.  The same. The DUKE'S palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.8">7. SCENE VII.  Verona. JULIA'S house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </li>
                  <li>
                     <span>
                        <a href="#R.1.5">3. ACT III</a>
                     </span>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  Milan. The DUKE's palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  The same. The DUKE's palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </li>
                  <li>
                     <span>
                        <a href="#R.1.6">4. ACT IV</a>
                     </span>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  The frontiers of Mantua. A forest.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.3">2. SCENE II.  Milan. Outside the DUKE's palace, under SILVIA's chamber.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.4">3. SCENE III.  The same.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.5">4. SCENE IV.  The same.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </li>
                  <li>
                     <span>
                        <a href="#R.1.7">5. ACT V</a>
                     </span>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.2">1. SCENE I.  Milan. An abbey.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.3">2. SCENE II.  The same. The DUKE's palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.4">3. SCENE III.  The frontiers of Mantua. The forest.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.5">4. SCENE IV.  Another part of the forest.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </li>
               </ul>
            </div>
         </div>
         <div class="content">
            <article class="preface" id="R.1.2">
               <header class="preface-titlepage">
                  <h2>Dramatis Personae</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="content">
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">DUKE OF MILAN, Father to Silvia. </span>
                  </p>
                  <table border="0" class="simplelist" summary="Simple list">
                     <tr>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">
                              <span class="personname">VALENTINE</span>
                              <span class="personname">PROTEUS</span>
                           </span>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">the two Gentlemen.</span>
                        </td>
                     </tr>
                  </table>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">ANTONIO, Father to Proteus.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">THURIO, a foolish rival to Valentine.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">EGLAMOUR, Agent for Silvia in her escape.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">HOST, where Julia lodges. </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">OUTLAWS, with Valentine.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">SPEED, a clownish servant to Valentine.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">LAUNCE, the like to Proteus.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">PANTHINO, Servant to Antonio.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">JULIA, beloved of Proteus.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">SILVIA, beloved of Valentine.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">LUCETTA, waiting-woman to Julia.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Servants, Musicians.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>SCENE  Verona; Milan; the frontiers of Mantua.</p>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.3">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 1. ACT I</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.2">1. SCENE I.  Verona. An open place.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.3">2. SCENE II.  The same. Garden of JULIA's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.4">3. SCENE III.  The same. ANTONIO's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Verona. An open place.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter VALENTINE and PROTEUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Cease to persuade, my loving Proteus:</div>
                              <div class="line">Home-keeping youth have ever homely wits.</div>
                              <div class="line">Were't not affection chains thy tender days</div>
                              <div class="line">To the sweet glances of thy honour'd love,</div>
                              <div class="line">I rather would entreat thy company</div>
                              <div class="line">To see the wonders of the world abroad,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than, living dully sluggardized at home,</div>
                              <div class="line">Wear out thy youth with shapeless idleness.</div>
                              <div class="line">But since thou lovest, love still and thrive therein,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even as I would when I to love begin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Wilt thou be gone? Sweet Valentine, adieu!</div>
                              <div class="line">Think on thy Proteus, when thou haply seest</div>
                              <div class="line">Some rare note-worthy object in thy travel:</div>
                              <div class="line">Wish me partaker in thy happiness</div>
                              <div class="line">When thou dost meet good hap; and in thy danger,</div>
                              <div class="line">If ever danger do environ thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">Commend thy grievance to my holy prayers,</div>
                              <div class="line">For I will be thy beadsman, Valentine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                              <div class="line">And on a love-book pray for my success?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon some book I love I'll pray for thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                              <div class="line">That's on some shallow story of deep love:</div>
                              <div class="line">How young Leander cross'd the Hellespont.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">That's a deep story of a deeper love:</div>
                              <div class="line">For he was more than over shoes in love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis true; for you are over boots in love,</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet you never swum the Hellespont.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Over the boots? nay, give me not the boots.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                              <div class="line">No, I will not, for it boots thee not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                              <div class="line">To be in love, where scorn is bought with groans;</div>
                              <div class="line">Coy looks with heart-sore sighs; one fading moment's mirth</div>
                              <div class="line">With twenty watchful, weary, tedious nights:</div>
                              <div class="line">If haply won, perhaps a hapless gain;</div>
                              <div class="line">If lost, why then a grievous labour won;</div>
                              <div class="line">However, but a folly bought with wit,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else a wit by folly vanquished.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">So, by your circumstance, you call me fool.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                              <div class="line">So, by your circumstance, I fear you'll prove.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis love you cavil at: I am not Love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Love is your master, for he masters you:</div>
                              <div class="line">And he that is so yoked by a fool,</div>
                              <div class="line">Methinks, should not be chronicled for wise.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet writers say, as in the sweetest bud</div>
                              <div class="line">The eating canker dwells, so eating love</div>
                              <div class="line">Inhabits in the finest wits of all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                              <div class="line">And writers say, as the most forward bud</div>
                              <div class="line">Is eaten by the canker ere it blow,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even so by love the young and tender wit</div>
                              <div class="line">Is turn'd to folly, blasting in the bud,</div>
                              <div class="line">Losing his verdure even in the prime</div>
                              <div class="line">And all the fair effects of future hopes.</div>
                              <div class="line">But wherefore waste I time to counsel thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">That art a votary to fond desire?</div>
                              <div class="line">Once more adieu! my father at the road</div>
                              <div class="line">Expects my coming, there to see me shipp'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">And thither will I bring thee, Valentine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet Proteus, no; now let us take our leave.</div>
                              <div class="line">To Milan let me hear from thee by letters</div>
                              <div class="line">Of thy success in love, and what news else</div>
                              <div class="line">Betideth here in absence of thy friend;</div>
                              <div class="line">And likewise will visit thee with mine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">All happiness bechance to thee in Milan!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VALENTINE</div>
                              <div class="line">As much to you at home! and so, farewell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">He after honour hunts, I after love:</div>
                              <div class="line">He leaves his friends to dignify them more,</div>
                              <div class="line">I leave myself, my friends and all, for love.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou, Julia, thou hast metamorphosed me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Made me neglect my studies, lose my time,</div>
                              <div class="line">War with good counsel, set the world at nought;</div>
                              <div class="line">Made wit with musing weak, heart sick with thought.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter SPEED</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir Proteus, save you! Saw you my master?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">But now he parted hence, to embark for Milan.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">Twenty to one then he is shipp'd already,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I have play'd the sheep in losing him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, a sheep doth very often stray,</div>
                              <div class="line">An if the shepherd be a while away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">You conclude that my master is a shepherd, then,</div>
                              <div class="line">and I a sheep?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">Why then, my horns are his horns, whether I wake or sleep.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">A silly answer and fitting well a sheep.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">This proves me still a sheep.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">True; and thy master a shepherd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, that I can deny by a circumstance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">It shall go hard but I'll prove it by another.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">The shepherd seeks the sheep, and not the sheep the</div>
                              <div class="line">shepherd; but I seek my master, and my master seeks</div>
                              <div class="line">not me: therefore I am no sheep.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">The sheep for fodder follow the shepherd; the</div>
                              <div class="line">shepherd for food follows not the sheep: thou for</div>
                              <div class="line">wages followest thy master; thy master for wages</div>
                              <div class="line">follows not thee: therefore thou art a sheep.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">Such another proof will make me cry 'baa.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">But, dost thou hear? gavest thou my letter to Julia?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay sir: I, a lost mutton, gave your letter to her,</div>
                              <div class="line">a laced mutton, and she, a laced mutton, gave me, a</div>
                              <div class="line">lost mutton, nothing for my labour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's too small a pasture for such store of muttons.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">If the ground be overcharged, you were best stick her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay: in that you are astray, 'twere best pound you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, sir, less than a pound shall serve me for</div>
                              <div class="line">carrying your letter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You mistake; I mean the pound,--a pinfold.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">From a pound to a pin? fold it over and over,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis threefold too little for carrying a letter to</div>
                              <div class="line">your lover.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">But what said she?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>First nodding</span>  Ay.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nod--Ay--why, that's noddy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">You mistook, sir; I say, she did nod: and you ask</div>
                              <div class="line">me if she did nod; and I say, 'Ay.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">And that set together is noddy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">Now you have taken the pains to set it together,</div>
                              <div class="line">take it for your pains.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">No, no; you shall have it for bearing the letter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I perceive I must be fain to bear with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why sir, how do you bear with me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, the letter, very orderly; having nothing</div>
                              <div class="line">but the word 'noddy' for my pains.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Beshrew me, but you have a quick wit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet it cannot overtake your slow purse.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come come, open the matter in brief: what said she?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">Open your purse, that the money and the matter may</div>
                              <div class="line">be both at once delivered.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROTEUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir, here is for your pains. What said she?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SPEED</div>
                              <div class="line">Truly, sir, I think you'll hardly win her.</div>
